room_title: Escape room "Zombie Escape" by Escape Evansville in Evansville
review: So much fun! We didn't solve all the puzzles, but it was really exciting, especially when the zombie was in the room! It was a great staff bonding activity too!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Escape" by Escape Evansville in Evansville
review: We had an absolute blast this evening doing the Zombie escape for my mom's birthday! The employees were so friendly. The guy in charge of our room couldn't have been more helpful and he really made the experience for us.

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Escape" by Escape Evansville in Evansville
review: Did the Zombie room with the family Saturday night. Had a blast. Thanks to the guys for being understanding and helpful with the youngest. Can't wait to try another room.

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Escape" by Escape Evansville in Evansville
review: One of the best things to do in town with a bunch of friends or co-workers! Staff was very friendly (shout out to Silver) and the Zombie room was very thrilling! Would definitely recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Zombie Escape" by Escape Evansville in Evansville
